name.en: Freshman English as an Introduction to Engineering

notice.ch: 高級課程。限英文被分至高級者選修。需另上1小時夜間演習課程，時間:週三第A節，上課教室TRA-202、TRA-201。不開放初選。

remark.ch: 高級課程。限英文被分至高級者選修。需另上1小時夜間演習課程，時間:週三第A節，上課教室TRA-202、TRA-201。不開放初選。

goal.ch:
新制大一英文課程目標 CEFR B2 15 
Descriptors
Listening 聽力
1.能聽懂用標準口語所說的內容大意。
2.能在主題熟悉的情況下，了解大部分音檔和影片的重點。
3.能在講者陳述清晰的情況下，了解個人專業領域內的課程或演講。

SPEAKING - Spoken Production 口語發表
4.能在事先準備的情況下，就感興趣的主題進行發表，並詳盡描述內容。
5.能透過提出論點、利弊、或因果關係等方法，來表達對一個議題的看法。

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction 口語互動
6.能以一定的流暢度、自然地進行口語互動。
7.能在努力投入的情況下，跟上並參與小組討論。

READING 閱讀
8.能快速瀏覽長篇複雜文本並掌握所需的細節。
9.能搜尋和瀏覽多個資料出處以獲取相關資訊。
10.能理解個人專業領域或感興趣主題的文本大意。
11.能了解文章作者的觀點。

WRITING寫作
12.能寫出拼字和標點符號用法正確的文章。
13.能寫出描述清楚、提供細節的文章。
14.能寫出結合多個來源想法的文章。
15.能寫出清楚的理由來支持自己的論點。
goal.en:
CEFR B2 15 Descriptors
Listening
1. I can understand the main ideas of what is    s     aid to me in standard spoken English. 
2. I can understand the main ideas of most      audios and videos of familiar topics.
3. I can follow a lecture or talk within my own    field if the presentation is clear.

SPEAKING - Spoken Production
4. I can give a clear, prepared presentation       about topics I am interested in and provide      detailed descriptions.
5. I can express my opinion on an issue by      giving reasons, talking about the advantages   and disadvantages, or analyzing cause and     effect.

SPEAKING - Spoken Interaction
6. I can interact quite fluently and naturally in    conversations.
7. I can, with some effort, keep up with and      contribute to group discussions.

READING
8. I can scan quickly through long and complex texts and find the details I want.
9. I can search and browse various sources to obtain relevant information.
10. I can understand the main ideas of reading materials within my field of study or of my          interest.
11. I can understand the writer’s point of view when reading an article.

WRITING
12. I can write an essay with reasonably               accurate spelling and punctuation.
13. I can write an essay with clear descriptions and proper details.
14. I can write an essay combining the ideas         from multiple sources.
15. I can write an essay giving reasons to          support my point of view.

outline.ch:
授課內容與活動設計：
1. 課程介紹
2. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
Listening 1: A Lifetime of Risks
● 聽力練習：圖表筆記技巧
● 口說練習：口頭發表
● CEFR B2 問卷調查
3. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
Listening 2: Science on the Edge
● 聽力練習：數字類關鍵詞
● 聽力對話練習
● 口說練習：如何領導小組討論
4. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
● 觀看單元影片: The Voyage of Magellan
● 練習批判思考策略：評估證據的強度與關聯性
5. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
Reading 1: Eating Well: Less Science, More Common Sense
● 文法及造句：被動語態
● 閱讀練習：找出作者觀點
6. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
Reading 2: A Personalized Nutrition Company Will Use Your DNA to Tell You What to Eat
● 詞彙技巧：因果關係
● 寫作技巧：如何寫邏輯通順的因果關係文章
7. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
● 觀看單元影片: Vitamin Deficiencies
● 寫作技巧：練習批判思考策略，因果關係寫作
8. 介紹英文寫作輔助資源及工具
(e.g. Grammarly, Cambridge Write ＆ Improve, etc.)
9. Midterm 期中考試週
10. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 1: What Kind of “Smart“ is AI?
● 聽力技巧：分辨觀點態度。
● 口說練習：如何支持證明論點
11. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 1: What Kind of “Smart“ is AI?
● 自學技巧：使用字典增進字彙能力
● 文法練習：動名詞與不定詞
12. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 2: Asking the Right Questions about AI
● 簡報技巧：練習如何強調重要觀點聽力技巧：如何建立大綱
● 口說練習：小組討論意見發表
13. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 2: Asking the Right Questions about AI
● 觀看單元影片:  Alan Turing 解碼始祖
● 口說練習：如何證明觀點
● 口說練習：小組發表演練
14. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
Reading 1: From Student to Employee: A Difficult Transition
● 文法：間接敘述句
● 閱讀練習：大綱的使用
15. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
Reading 2: Making My First Post-College Career Decision
● 詞彙技巧：詞類變化
● 寫作技巧：摘要寫作要點
16. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
● 觀看單元影片:  College Graduate
● 批判思考策略與寫作：如何證明觀點
17. Review
期末複習
18. 期末考試

outline.en:
Topics ＆ Classroom Activities:
1. Course introduction
2. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
● Listening 1: A Lifetime of Risks
● Listening skill: Note-taking using a chart
● Speaking skill: Giving a one-minute presentation
● CEFR B2 Survey
3. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
Listening 2: Science on the Edge
● Listening skill: Listening for specific information (dates, numbers, percentages, etc.)
● Speaking skill: listening ＆ conversation
● Speaking Skill: Leading  a group discussion
4. Topic: Behavioral Science: Does taking risks change our lives?
● Watch the unit video: The Voyage of Magellan
● Critical Thinking Strategy: Evaluate the strength and relevance of evidence
5. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
Reading 1: Eating Well: Less Science, More Common Sense
● Grammar: Agents with the passive voice
● Reading Skill: Recognizing bias
6. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
Reading 2: A Personalized Nutrition Company Will Use Your DNA to Tell You What to Eat
● Vocabulary Skill: Cause and effect collocations
● Writing Skill: Writing a cause and effect essay.
7. Topic: Nutritional Science- Should science influence what we eat?
● Work with the Video: Vitamin Deficiencies
● Critical Thinking Strategy: Analyzing texts for cause and effect relationships
8. Introduce useful writing resources and tools (e.g. Grammarly, Cambridge Write ＆ Improve, etc.)
9. Midterm
10. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 1: What Kind of “Smart“ is AI?
● Listening Skill: Inferring a speaker‘s attitude
11. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 1: What Kind of “Smart“ is AI?
● Vocabulary Skill: Using the dictionary
● Grammar: Gerunds and infinitives as the objects of verbs.
12. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
Listening 2: Asking the Right Question
● Pronunciation: Stress on important words
● Note-taking Skill: Building an outline to take notes on a discussion
13. Topic: Neurology: Will artificial intelligence ever be as smart as humans?
● Work with the Video: Alan Turing
● Critical Thinking Strategy: Justifying claims
14. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
Reading 1: From Student to Employee: A Difficult Transition
● Grammar: Reported speech with the present tense and shifting tenses
● Reading Skill: Using an outline
15. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
Reading 2: Making My First Post-College Career Decision
● Vocabulary Skill: Word forms
● Writing Skill: Writing a summary
16. Topic: Engineering ＆ Education: Does school prepare you for work?
● Work with the Video: College Graduate.
● Critical Thinking Strategy: Justifying your opinions
17. Review
18. Final Exam

Q: Skills for Success: Listening ＆ Speaking 3B
Q: Skills for Success:: Reading ＆ Writing 4B

工程領域相關參考資源:

1. TED-Ed Engineering Lessons
  https://ed.ted.com/lessons?category=engineering
 
2. Smarter Every Day
  https://www.smartereveryday.com/
 
3. LESICS: Learn Engineering through Physics
  https://www.youtube.com/c/Lesics/videos
 
4. Engineerguy
  https://www.youtube.com/user/engineerguyvideo/featured
 
5. Interesting Engineering
  https://www.youtube.com/c/Interestingengineeringofficial/featured
 
6. Engineering | MIT News | Massachusetts Institute of Technology
  https://news.mit.edu/topic?name=engineering
 
7. Engineering Shows – National Geographic Channel
  https://www.natgeotv.com/me/shows/subject/engineering
 
8. Engineering News – The Engineer
  https://www.theengineer.co.uk/
 
9. Engineering News – PHYS ORG
  https://phys.org/technology-news/engineering/
 
10 Engineering – Science News for Students
  https://www.sciencenewsforstudents.org/article/scientists-say-engineering

gradMethod.ch:
自學小組 20％
平常成績 （小考、課堂參與、出缺席等）25％
期中評量 20％
期末評量 20％      
英語自學   5％
gradMethod.en:
Study group 30％
Performance (quizzes, participation, attendance, etc.) 25％
Midterm assessment 20％
Final Exam 20％
Self-learning 5％
